name: Minesweeper VR (itch)
description:
Minesweeper VR 💣

The classic puzzle game, part of a series of 12 monthly games to be released throughout 2019! Made in a few weeks.

Carefully uncover tiles in a 4x4x6 grid using your VR controller, trying to discover hidden mines without setting them off in this 3D reincarnation of the classic puzzle game! Plant little red flags in tiles which you think are mines, while sheepishly pressing in the rest of the tiles with your eyes closed and your fingers crossed. Good luck, and don't blow yourself up!

NOTE: VR IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME. IT HAS ONLY BEEN TESTED ON VIVE, BUT SHOULD WORK FINE ON OCULUS TOO. PLEASE CONSIDER CHECKING THE GAME WORKS ON YOUR SETUP BEFORE DONATING, TO AVOID DISAPPOINTMENT!

Controls (Vive)

Trackpad (hold): Teleport

Trigger: Interact with buttons/press tiles

Grip (Hold): Grab an object, the game board, or a ducky

Price

Would recommend downloading for free; it's only a quick prototype. Don't feel bad! However any donations would be very much appreciated and will win you a credit in future projects ;)

Special Thanks

Katie Coughlan, Max Chapman, Hayley Osborn, and anyone else who has supported me along the way 😄
